video.title: Julius Jr.
video.synopsis: Paul Frank's fun artwork comes to life in this show that follows monkey Julius Jr. and his friends as they explore the world and help each other out.

episodes.synopsis: A millipede who longs to fly shows the gang how to like themselves just the way they are; Julius builds a robot to replace Worry Bear's lost toy.
episodes.title: Butterfly Dreams / Rock Sock 3000

episodes.synopsis: A magic cupcake helps Clancy feel better about being short, but it works too well; Worry Bear gets scared when Clancy's hobbyhorse comes to life.
episodes.title: Pony Macaroni / Stretch Clancy

episodes.synopsis: Sheree thinks she can run Sagebrush Farm alone until she tries it; the gang learns that Ping's invisible dragon friend is real and needs their help.
episodes.title: Farmer Sheree / Dez the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Julius is afraid to tell Sheree that he doesn't like her banana desserts; Julius and his friends disagree about what game to play.
episodes.title: Pirates and Superheroes / Banana-licious

episodes.synopsis: Clancy gets sick and the gang goes to extremes to help him fall asleep; Julius is upset when his shadow turns out to be a better inventor than he is.
episodes.title: Clancy's Sniffles / Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Ping decides to color the whole box pink, without talking to the gang first; Worry Bear and Ping cooperate on figuring out their Halloween costumes.
episodes.title: Dressed for Spook-cess / Think Pink

episodes.synopsis: Worry Bear pays so much attention to his sticker collection that he ignores his friends; Clancy gets upset when he can't learn a new sport right away.
episodes.title: Worry Bear's Collection / Rocket Roller Skates

episodes.synopsis: The gang tries to teach Worry Bear the fun of trying new things; Sheree and Julius accidentally hurt a cloud's feelings while teaching it to snow.
episodes.title: No Snow Mo / Gravity Games

episodes.synopsis: Sheree's friends "borrow" all her Bouncy Beans without asking permission; Julius gets so caught up in being a hero that he forgets to keep a promise.
episodes.title: Bouncy Beans / A Real Hero

episodes.synopsis: A shooting star enchants the gang when she crashes into the box; Clancy and Bob the dog get carried away pulling pranks on the gang.
episodes.title: Star Games / The Joke's on Who

episodes.synopsis: Sheree frets over her birthday gift for Worry Bear; Ping sets out to prove to the friends that she can do things for herself.
episodes.title: From Me to You / Give Ping a Chance

episodes.synopsis: Dez disappears when it's time to perform a dance with Ping; Worry Bear grows extremely upset when his party doesn't go exactly as he'd planned.
episodes.title: Magic Monkey, Hidden Dragon / The Perfect Pirate Day

episodes.synopsis: Clancy learns the importance of putting things away where they belong; Clancy is afraid to tell Julius that he accidentally broke the Rock Sock 3000.
episodes.title: Tidy up Time / Roboflop

episodes.synopsis: Clancy wants revenge when Sharky the pirate accidentally wrecks the gang's sand castle; a dinosaur dentist helps reassure a scared Worry Bear.
episodes.title: Operation Sand Squasher / Dr. Flossoraptor

episodes.synopsis: The gang's lunch disappears during a picnic in Bugswana; Julius tries to push his ideas over everyone else's in a snowflake-making contest.
episodes.title: The Sneaky Snackers / Make a Flake

episodes.synopsis: Julius is so focused on fixing his invention, the Fruitronic 5000, that he forgets to eat; Ping begins to doubt her kite-flying abilities.
episodes.title: The Fruitronic 5000 / Flight of Fancy

episodes.synopsis: Clancy and his friends help Pirate Diamondbeard find buried treasure; Worry Bear nearly misses a dance because he's too busy helping others.
episodes.title: Clancy, Be Careful / Just Speak Up

episodes.synopsis: Sheree tries to find out why there are no pictures of Ping in the gang's photo album; Nova doesn't invite Clancy to her outer-space birthday party.
episodes.title: Say, Ping! / Happy Birthday, Nova

episodes.synopsis: The gang's routine is thrown off when Shaka Brah moves into the box; Julius finds Squeakers the duck, one of his old baby toys.
episodes.title: Shaka Brah in the House / Baby Squeakers

episodes.synopsis: Julius helps Worry Bear find his missing Giggle Goggles; Julius may lose the scavenger hunt when slow Vic the snail joins his team.
episodes.title: Giggle Goggles / Scavenger Safari

episodes.synopsis: Clancy turns everything the gang does into a contest, taking the fun out of it all; Julius ignores safety during the launch of his hot-air balloon.
episodes.title: The Very Berry Race / Check the Checklist

episodes.synopsis: Sheree and the friends find fun activities to do in the rain; Clancy gets careless when Worry Bear asks him to keep an eye on his rock collection.
episodes.title: Crow-Con / Rock Sitting

episodes.synopsis: Julius learns that faster doesn't mean better when he repairs Scooter the stunt plane; the gang makes a big mistake when planning a parade.
episodes.title: Plane Dilemma / Delayed Parade

episodes.synopsis: When the gang goes camping on Mars, a spooky story makes Clancy nervous; Worry Bear grows annoyed with Ping, who's trying to be just like him.
episodes.title: Bump on Mars / Worry Bear Junior

episodes.synopsis: Julius's music group breaks up, but he finds that his one-man band isn't as much fun; Clancy is frustrated when he can't beat a game's high score.
episodes.title: Julius Goes Solo / Clancy Can't Win

episodes.synopsis: Julius and Clancy try to find a new home for Chachi, who can't live in the cold of Icelaska; Chachi gets tired when everyone plays with him at once.
episodes.title: Welcome Home Chachi / Chachi Time

episodes.synopsis: When Sheree and Ping join Dazzle's club, Dazzle wants to leave Ping out; Everyone wants to know what's inside a box addressed to Pirate Diamondbeard.
episodes.title: Dazzle Girls / The Box

episodes.synopsis: When Julius meets his idol, The Great Inventini, things do not go as planned; Clancy annoys the gang when they go to a movie that he has already seen.
episodes.title: Great Inventini / Drive In Distractions

episodes.synopsis: Julius means well when he invents a special robot to take over Nadia's work; Sheree needs to stay positive when Dez spills her shmooshberry jam.
episodes.title: Helping Hands / Imagineberry Jam

episodes.synopsis: Worry Bear claims he has a rare allergy to avoid riding a rubber-ducky-themed water slide; Ping daydreams instead of listening to instructions.
episodes.title: Duckyitis / Orange Daydream

episodes.synopsis: The kids are invited to play a pirate game, but Sharky does not play fair; Clancy must work with Worry Bear when they get stuck together with gum.
episodes.title: Capture the Pirate Flag / Gummiest Bear

episodes.synopsis: When Sharky is sick with the Shiver Me Timbers, he wants to play with his friends instead of resting; Clancy gets Ping to do his chore for him.
episodes.title: Party Me Hearties / Chore Bore

episodes.synopsis: The gang tries to celebrate Snowflake Day a certain way, but their version turns out different; Worry Bear gets motion sick playing Starball in space.
episodes.title: Snowflake Day / Deep Space Sport

episodes.synopsis: Julius refuses help from Ping and Clancy, then realizes he spoke too soon; when Clancy is invited to Shaka Brah's for a sleepover, he gets homesick.
episodes.title: Pumpkin Plumper / No Sleep Over

episodes.synopsis: Sheree has a hard time deciding which friend to invite on Nadia's new Skymarine; Sharky needs his friends' help to conquer his fear of the dark.
episodes.title: Sheree's Choice / Sharky in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: The friends try to stay awake through the night to witness the once-a-year blooming of a special flower; Shaka Brah's shy cousin visits the box fort.
episodes.title: Smellalicious Flower / Welcomesicle Party

episodes.synopsis: Julius tries to create the ultimate back scratcher; Ping is thrilled when she invents something with Julius, until her friends put in their two cents.
episodes.title: Invention Tension / Flying Oh-Ee-Oh

episodes.synopsis: Julius invents something to brighten Worry Bear's rainy day; Julius wants all of his friends to celebrate together, so he invents a new holiday.
episodes.title: Worry Bear Finds the Light / Julius's Alliday

episodes.synopsis: Ping gets frustrated when she is constantly cast as the baby in a game of dress-up; Ping feels upset when it seems that Julius is allergic to Chachi.
episodes.title: Ping's Pretend Problem / Please Don't Sneeze

episodes.synopsis: Worry Bear needs help when he loses his lucky hat before going onstage and forgets all his jokes; Julius struggles to learn a popular new dance.
episodes.title: Worry Bear's Lucky Hat / Do the Dezbop

episodes.synopsis: Rock Sock feels ignored by Julius and goes to work for Nadia; Clancy realizes he's the only one among his friends who doesn't have a cool collection.
episodes.title: We Love You Rock Sock / Clancy's Collection

episodes.synopsis: Clancy picks only the best basketball players for his team, but realizes he misses his favorite teammate; Sheree makes a magical friend in the forest.
episodes.title: Clancy's Dream Team / Magical Morphimal

episodes.synopsis: Julius and the gang avoid visiting a rhinoceros because of his grumpy reputation; Julius makes a promise to Worry Bear that is hard for him to keep.
episodes.title: Grumpnocerous / Later Skater

episodes.synopsis: When Ping gets appointed Dazzle's Royal Paper Flower Maker, she has no time for anything else; Julius keeps his friends waiting for a sailing trip.
episodes.title: Daisy for Dazzle / Waiting for Julius

episodes.synopsis: Pirate Diamondbeard and Julius switch places for a day; Julius and the gang all pitch in to help Marcel the Martian get the garden of his dreams.
episodes.title: Pirate Julius / Mars Bouquet

episodes.synopsis: A peek at Worry Bear's sketchbook convinces the gang that he is mad at them; Sheree prepares for her magic show, and the gang's belongings disappear.
episodes.title: Not So Funny Pages / Missing Piece Mystery

episodes.synopsis: When Clancy breaks his skateboard at the competition, Julius figures out a way for him to compete; Sheree's pals help her search for her superpower.
episodes.title: 2 Skate 2B Great / Sparkletasia

episodes.synopsis: Rock Sock tries to throw the perfect surprise party to show appreciation for Julius; Worry Bear is labeled a hero when he supposedly saves a chick.
episodes.title: Appreciated / Our Hero Worry Bear

episodes.synopsis: Julius invents a way to turn his friends into versions of himself, then starts to miss their differences; Ping wishes for Worry Bear to stop worrying.
episodes.title: Julius-inator / Don't Worry Be Happy

episodes.synopsis: Julius learns an important lesson in an alternate world, where nothing comes to life; Clancy and Ping struggle to keep quiet during a rehearsal.
episodes.title: Box Fort of Oz / Firefly Festival

episodes.synopsis: Sheree's plan to spy on Bob has a missing piece; When Ping's friends get shrunk in the Shrinkerator, she tries to bring them back to normal size.
episodes.title: Double O Sheree / Ping's In Charge

episodes.synopsis: When the gang gets locked in a closet, they try to have fun until help arrives; Julius and his friends try to make music without electricity.
episodes.title: Funk in the Junk / Enginopalooza
